title: Are you allowed to fap without any porn or imagination while on NoFap? - Quora

response.answer_text: NoFap is all completely made up drivel, so you can set the rules however you like. My understanding of NoFap is that they mean no fapping because this satisfies this neurotic thing that antisex types have about nobody having any fun, apparently, so I would say that if you wanna be a NoFapper for whatever stupid reason, then you probably shouldn’t fap at all.
